IDBTransactionObjectStore.summary:
The objectStore() method of the
interface returns an object store that has already been
added to the scope of this transaction.

remarks.para:
Every call to this method on the same transaction object, with the same name, returns
the same instance. If this method is called on a different
transaction object, a different instance is returned.

IDBTransactionObjectStore.returns: An object for accessing an object store.
